hooks.command: file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.rs$'; then cargo check --quiet 2>&1 || (echo 'Rust syntax error detected' && exit 2); fi; exit 0

cmd=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.command // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$cmd" ] && echo "$cmd" | grep -q 'git commit'; then echo 'ðŸ”’ Running post-commit security checks...' && bash .claude/hooks/pre-commit-security.sh 2>&1 || echo 'âš ï¸  Security check warnings (non-blocking)'; fi; exit 0

file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.rs$' && [ -f "$file_path" ]; then cargo fmt -- "$file_path" 2>&1 && echo "Formatted $file_path"; fi; exit 0

file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -q '\.rs$'; then cargo clippy --quiet -- -D warnings 2>&1 || echo 'Clippy warnings found'; fi; exit 0

file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -q '^src/.*\.rs$'; then cargo test --quiet 2>&1 || echo 'Some tests failed'; fi; exit 0

file_path=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r '.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && echo "$file_path" | grep -qE 'Cargo\.(toml|lock)$'; then cargo audit --quiet || echo 'Security vulnerabilities detected'; fi; exit 0
